reward-npc-visit: üéÅ Visit the reward NPC to claim your rewards!

dialogs.0: Enemy forces are at our gates!
dialogs.1: We need every able warrior.
dialogs.2: Will you stand with us?

dialogs.0: A portal to another dimension has opened!
dialogs.1: Monsters are pouring through.
dialogs.2: We must close it before it's too late.
dialogs.3: You'll need the Portal Key to seal it.

dialogs.0: The void is consuming our world!
dialogs.1: Dark creatures emerge from the shadows.
dialogs.2: We must push them back.
dialogs.3: Are you brave enough to enter the void?

dialogs.0: The time has come for the final confrontation.
dialogs.1: All our hopes rest on you.
dialogs.2: The Dark Lord awaits in his fortress.
dialogs.3: This battle will decide the fate of the world.

dialogs.0: Dark clouds gather on the horizon.
dialogs.1: A storm unlike any other approaches.
dialogs.2: We must prepare our defenses.
dialogs.3: Gather the storm crystals to protect the city.

dialogs.0: This is it - our last chance.
dialogs.1: The enemy surrounds us.
dialogs.2: We fight here or we fall.
dialogs.3: Will you stand with us?

dialogs.0: The war is over at last.
dialogs.1: A new era of peace begins.
dialogs.2: But we must remain vigilant.
dialogs.3: Help us rebuild what was lost.
dialogs.4: Together, we'll create a better world.

dialogs.0: Many heroes have fallen in this war.
dialogs.1: Their sacrifice must not be forgotten.
dialogs.2: We must honor their memory.
dialogs.3: Gather the memorial stones.
dialogs.4: Place them at the Heroes' Monument.

dialogs.0: The realm needs an eternal guardian.
dialogs.1: One who will watch over it forever.
dialogs.2: This is a great responsibility.
dialogs.3: You will gain immense power.
dialogs.4: But you must sacrifice your mortality.
dialogs.5: Will you become the Eternal Guardian?

dialogs.0: The old heroes have passed.
dialogs.1: But their legacy must continue.
dialogs.2: You are the new generation.
dialogs.3: Take up their mantle.

dialogs.0: The war has left scars on the land.
dialogs.1: Nature itself needs healing.
dialogs.2: Use the Seeds of Life to restore the forests.
dialogs.3: Purify the corrupted waters.

lost_kingdom.name: The Lost Kingdom
lost_kingdom.info: Discover the fate of the lost kingdom

dialogs.0: Long ago, a great kingdom vanished overnight.
dialogs.1: No one knows what happened to it.
dialogs.2: But I've found clues to its location!
dialogs.3: Will you help me uncover the truth?

dialogs.0: Shadow creatures are invading our realm!
dialogs.1: They emerge from dark portals at night.
dialogs.2: We must close these portals before it's too late.
dialogs.3: Will you help us fight back the darkness?

dialogs.0: Dark magic has corrupted vast territories.
dialogs.1: The land itself has turned evil.
dialogs.2: Plants wither, animals become monsters.
dialogs.3: We need someone to purify these lands.

ancient_evil.name: Ancient Evil
ancient_evil.info: Prevent the awakening of an ancient evil

dialogs.0: An ancient evil stirs in its prison.
dialogs.1: The seals that bind it are weakening.
dialogs.2: If it breaks free, all will be lost.
dialogs.3: We must strengthen the seals!

heroes_alliance.name: Heroes Alliance
heroes_alliance.info: Form an alliance of legendary heroes

dialogs.0: The threat is too great for one hero alone.
dialogs.1: We must form an alliance of champions.
dialogs.2: Seek out the greatest warriors of each land.
dialogs.3: Convince them to join our cause.
dialogs.4: Together, we can save the world!

dragon_trials.name: Dragon Trials
dragon_trials.info: Complete the trials of the Dragon Lords

dialogs.0: The Dragon Lords have issued a challenge.
dialogs.1: Complete their trials to earn their respect.
dialogs.2: Each trial tests a different virtue.
dialogs.3: Courage, Wisdom, Strength, and Honor.

dialogs.0: The Dragon Heart is a legendary artifact.
dialogs.1: It grants its wielder dragon-like powers.
dialogs.2: But it's guarded by the Elder Dragon.
dialogs.3: You must prove yourself worthy.

dragon_pact.name: Dragon Pact
dragon_pact.info: Form a pact with the dragon clan

dialogs.0: The Dragon Clan offers you a pact.
dialogs.1: Serve them, and gain their power.
dialogs.2: But the pact binds you forever.
dialogs.3: You'll become part dragon yourself.
dialogs.4: Is this a price you're willing to pay?

dialogs.0: A massive fortress floats in the sky.
dialogs.1: It's the enemy's main stronghold.
dialogs.2: We must assault it to end this war.
dialogs.3: But first, we need a way to reach it.

shadow_cult.name: Shadow Cult
shadow_cult.info: Infiltrate and destroy the shadow cult

dialogs.0: A dark cult operates in the shadows.
dialogs.1: They're planning something terrible.
dialogs.2: We need someone to infiltrate them.
dialogs.3: Learn their plans and stop them.

dialogs.0: The cultists are performing a forbidden ritual!
dialogs.1: They're trying to summon an ancient demon!
dialogs.2: We must stop them before midnight!
dialogs.3: The ritual site is heavily guarded.
dialogs.4: Failure means the end of our world!

dialogs.0: A chaos storm approaches our realm!
dialogs.1: It warps reality itself!
dialogs.2: We need to activate the protection barriers.
dialogs.3: But someone must venture into the storm.

dialogs.0: The Dark Lord's fortress stands before us.
dialogs.1: Its walls are said to be impenetrable.
dialogs.2: But we've found a secret entrance.
dialogs.3: We need a hero to lead the infiltration.
dialogs.4: This could be our only chance!

dialogs.0: A rift between dimensions has opened!
dialogs.1: Strange creatures pour through!
dialogs.2: Reality itself is at risk!
dialogs.3: We must close it from both sides!
dialogs.4: Will you enter the other dimension?

dialogs.0: Ancient ruins have been discovered nearby.
dialogs.1: They may contain powerful artifacts.
dialogs.2: But beware - they're protected by ancient magic.

warrior_advancement.name: Warrior Advancement
warrior_advancement.info: Advance your warrior class to the next level

dialogs.0: You've proven yourself as a warrior.
dialogs.1: It's time to advance to the next level.
dialogs.2: This will unlock new abilities and skills.
dialogs.3: But first, you must pass the Trial of Strength.
dialogs.4: Are you ready to become a true warrior?
